Title: Lemonhope Part Two
Writer: Tom Herpich (story), Tom Herpich, Steve Wolfhard
Actors: Jeremy Shada, Hynden Walch, Justin Roiland, Creed Bratton
Plot: Lemonhope meets an adventurer who teaches him true freedom. But even with his new life of freedom he is plagued with dreams of his lemon kingdom and his family being imprisoned.
